title: Ticket #6508: from_ip_string() doesn't unset enable_convert_default_IP_to_socket_IP
description:
This causes more of the rewriting code to run than is necessary.

(4) (bug) ConvertDefaultIpToSocketIp() should have been bailing out because network_interface_to_ip() should be setting enable_convert_default_IP_to_socket_IP to false if the NETWORK_INTERFACE only matches one interface, and no machine should have interfaces with the same address.

(4) Oh, hey, look at that. If condor_sockaddr::from_ip_string() works on NETWORK_INTERFACE, we don't unset enable_convert_default_IP_to_socket_IP. We should maybe fix that.
remarks: Obsoleted by #6525.
creator: tlmiller
